title: Morde main since 2010, Bot lane Morde Should! Be a thing BUT!!
body:
I have over 4k games played and more of them are Morde then any other champion and I mained Morde Since 2010 And these recent changes to Morde are devastating, But not for the reasons you may think. Let me explain.

Bot lane Morde can and should be a thing. I'm 100% behind Morde been viable bot lane in fact when I first started playing LoL Morde was a bot lane APC that was his role that was meta (AP bot with support and ADCs went mid). But back then I thought it was stupid to go bot with Morde because his ult was designed to steal ADCs souls and ADCs went mid so I went mid with Morde (And got raged at for it for been so "unmeta")
Morde thrived on the solo lane EXP so he kinda stayed there while ADCs started going bot, So I'm fine with Morde following ADCs wherever they go. What I'm not fine with is the way it is planned to happen by gutting existing playstyles for no reason.

As mentioned Morde thrived on Solo lane EXP so this change:
_[Creeping Death [ W ]
    New Passive: Mordekaiser receives full experience from any lane minion he kills, regardless of lane partners](http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/tag/mordekaiser/#9)_
Is nice attempt to keep Morde topped up on EXP in duo lane.
Cons are:
-It's still better EXP to solo lane, Since it wont give him as much EXP as he would get as a solo laner because he will get zoned and pushed out of lane and miss CS (People don't 100% CS in lane, Specially Melees vs in bot) Unless he gets 100% EXP from all minions it will be fairly mediocre. (Think how many people use EXP runes a little EXP boost doesn't help that much)
-If you kill someone that is a higher level then you, You get more EXP. So enemy laners will catch up on any slight EXP lead pretty easily if they get a kill.

Regardless of the Cons it does help Morde to be viable bot and to want to go bot and it's a good way to encourage players to take him bot because it doesn't take anything away from solo lane Morde and gives him a nice mechanic to Duo lane Morde, Reason I'm explaining this is because there are good and bad ways to incentivize duo lane Morde.
Such as:
_New Active - Harvesters of Sorrow: Mordekaiser and target ally champion gain 75 Movement Speed while moving toward one another._
Rioter CertaintyT:
[**Harvesters of Sorrow (W) is not castable without an ally champion present.** If you are alone as Mordekaiser, you'll have to do without it unless an ally ganks/roams for you. ](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/KhcvQBlG-mordekaiser-change-summary-feedback-thread?comment=0002000000000000)
This is an horrible gut wrenching way to force Morde to go Duo lane. These changes are akin to trying to get kids to do well in school say the EXP boost is like "Hey kids do well I will give you a gold sticker!" which is fine but this change is "LISTEN UP KIDS I STOLE ALL YOUR TOYS AND YOUR NOT GETTING THEM BACK UNTIL YOU DO GOOD AT SCHOOL" But except doing good at school its using your W skill. It's blackmail and extortion to physically force people to go Duo lane Morde by hurting his solo lane (Which isn't even OP to begin with) For no discernible reason...

Just basically deleted his W for solo lanes, W was essential to Surviving ganks and burst dmg (Getting a full combo to your slow moving face that W's MR can be a lifesaver) and CC with the Armor/MR + Small shield generation, And been able to push the lane and help cs and heal a bit with spell vamp when putting it on a minion from a safe distance, With the movespeed it also helps to escape or chase near minions.
All that and more is completely gone.

Then I read on the PBE
_[Siphon of Destruction [ E ]
    Base damage decreased from 70/115/160/205/250 to 35/65/95/125/155](http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/tag/mordekaiser/#9)_
I just don't know anymore... Morde NEEDS his E to poke its his primary form of poke and DMG and it's dmg is basically cut in half? Level 2 E does less DMG then level 1 E currently and level 1 E currently is pretty bad at poking and trading.
I don't know how Morde is expected to trade with Cait/Sona with 35 dmg on 5sec CD that damages himself.. (When cait can have 76+ dmg auto attacks level 1)
And you Really need the ranged dmg for bot lane and this is Mordes only ranged attack (Since Q is getting reworked into melee only nerfing Mordes ranged dmg even more)

Riot likes to use the term hidden power, Here are some hidden weaknesses to Morde Bot lane:
-There is no passive that says "Morde must push the lane" but Morde will push the lane, You cannot CS effectively without his AOE spells and you need to generate a shield with AOE spells to trade.
-Bot lane is a longer lane then mid so pushing the lane makes your more susceptible to ganks. (Top Morde has his level advantage over the JG to compensate) and Mid lane you can reset the waves by pushing into tower a easier because it's a shorter lane which is hugely important to countering a lot of champions mid as Morde (With certain champions you if you can't fight them you need to push the wave into the tower to mess with there CSing then let the minions reset asap)
Now if you want to do that bot it's a longer lane so it's going to take more time to push the wave into the tower, ADC's are generally better at CSing under tower, It's going to take the wave longer to get back into the middle of the lane in bot lane, All hidden disadvantages to Morde bot.

But I really feel gut wrenched and astonished when I read some things (no offense) CertainlyT says: "_**[Morde is still able to solo lane/jungle in our testing](http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/KhcvQBlG-mordekaiser-change-summary-feedback-thread?comment=0002000000000000)**_" 1. Morde doesn't and shouldn't jungle 2. Removing W from Morde kills his clear speed and survivability. Who is doing this testing and how can they think Morde can jungle, without his W.... I feel like this is a bad dream.

There are a billion other things I could criticize and complain about how things could be done better in a million different ways I literally could go on for days and would be more then willing to do so if Riot wanted to listen.

**TL;DR:** Morde should have changes to be Viable in a Duo lane, These are not the nerfs/changes he needs

Links on the changes:
Announced changes http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/gameplay-update-juggernauts
PBE Stat changes http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/tag/mordekaiser/#9
PBE Riot posts about changes http://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/champions-gameplay-feedback/KhcvQBlG-mordekaiser-change-summary-feedback-thread

Yeah, as a Morde player, these changes are pretty offensive. CertainT shouldn't be allowed to touch old champs considering his track record with toxic champ design. 

They can push it however they want but at the end of the day Riot has essentially said "You they fanbase will not be taken into account. If we want to take a champ you love and shit all over it in an attempt to be creative and experimental (which never ends well ala Bard) we will because we dont design champs FOR you, we design them DESPITE you."

They say they are making these changes to give him clear weaknesses, but the only change they've made to actually give a weakness is FORCE him bot lane aka deal with being pummeled by ranged AAs, which is a joke. 

Do I think it's cool that they're trying to make meta a little more flexible? Yes.
Do I think it should be done at the detriment of Morde's main role? No.
Does Riot give a shit what I or any other Morde player thinks? Also No.

Yep at the end of the day Riot can do whatever they want, Doesn't mean I will be happy about it.

If this rework happened and only thing different was W was able to be used on himself or minions like it can now it wouldn't be so intrusive and forceful.
Not only is that bad because there just removing a skill to force to to duo lane, It's bad because EVEN if you go bot and your support dies or backs or is off warding (or bard) or your roaming or farming alone mid game you have lost your W. Which hurts duo bot lane Morde a lot.

Simply APC duo bot lane Morde with a self castable W > APC duo bot lane Morde without a self castable W.

Again I think Morde can very easily be worked into bot lane (Without unnecessarily killing his solo lane) and should be, But his kit needs to be able to handle things like Cait/Sona Graves/Blitz which he can't early game. His Poke/trading which is basically his E has his damage nerfed and costs health to do so trading with that is gonna be super hard.

Not to mention things like bot lane generally has bad wave clear (unlike top/mid who generally have some AOE to reset waves quicker) bot will sit under tower and farm from safety with ranged autos all day while morde continues to push. Then when his slow ass gets ganked with 0 CC and only a situational slight movement speed his weak early game damage to save him it's not going to end well.

I agree, these changes make me sad as I really love playing Morde. Lately it feels like Riot has lost sight of how to help champions without either making them a shell of their former selfs, or making them into someone completely different.

Honestly i don't think there is a need for a Mordekaiser rework except for giving him a mobility skill. His kit lacks CC but the buffs to {{item:3152}} and {{item:3116}} which are both items that a Mordekaiser builds should be enough to make him viable.

He doesn't need a good mobility skill and I wouldn't want him to get one, I like Morde as he is intended to be a slow moving tanky damage dealer. If he where to get good mobility he will have to lose something else. (Such as having less damage or a weaker shield)

His current kit is awkward in that in lane he kinda needs to blow summoners to guarantee kills against good enemies and mid game or team fights he kinda needs a good initiator or a primary tank to really shine. Because your lack of mobility and CC it's difficult catch targets but with say a sej/malphite/amumu you can W them (Giving them armor/mr to survive better and giving them a better sunfire AOE dmg) Which also shields/spellvamps for you setting you up so you can then you can just go in and do your damage.

Which makes him less viable in solo Q because of this reliance (And even less reliable on PBE because your W is literally required to have an ally near you)

But in competitive play you can easily work around his ult making it fairly useless (Killing his primary utility he brings to team) and he just doesn't do as much dmg or tank as much as other champions. For example Morde without his ult with a Wota and Rylais < Vlad with Wota Rylais who still has a useful ult.

So in a way he is viable and a pretty good pick in a solo Q with right team comp. But he could be so much more viable if his kit was changed a bit in one of the million possible ways. (But the way it's done on the PBE hurts his solo lane and makes him pretty bad duo lane and makes him possibly not viable at all.)
